For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: Conspiracy in the sign of the cross - Knights of the holy grave (2002). Investigative journalists, Egmont R. Koch and Oliver Schrom, document the little known history of this secretive catholic order that includes amongst its member prominent bankers, politicians and university professors. They are the elite troops of Vatican curia and are used to execute secret orders that usually end up in illegal actitivies. Officially they support the Catholic church but in reality they do their dirty work. History has recorded that they have helped the Nazi war criminals escape to safety, they have close ties with the Mafia and are covering up for all sorts of criminal bussiness deals and suspicious financial transactions that are used to support totalitarian regimes all over the world. Also includes a partial membership list. 320 pages, some documents.
